pageProduct.name: Sukin Hydrating Conditioner 500ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Sukin Hydrating Conditioner, for Dry and Damaged Hair
A moisturising, rich conditioner with Shea Butter, Coconut and Sesame Oils to help nourish, strengthen and repair dry and damaged hair. Olive Oil and Vitamin E add lustre to dull hair and help reduce frizz. Scent of Coconut and Lime.
Suitable for Dry and Damaged Hair

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Fragrance (Parfum)*, Isopropyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene**, Citral**. *Natural Fragrance **Component of Natural Fragrance

Directions

Following Sukin’s Hydrating Shampoo, massage Sukin’s Hydrating Conditioner into the hair, focusing on the ends. Rinse thoroughly
